import React from "react"; import "../styles/AboutMe.css"; import profilePic from "../images/profilepic.jpg"; const AboutMe = () => { return (

Hey, I'm Amanda!

I'm a software engineer, open-source contributor, and web developer. I've been building websites and applications for years, focusing on creating user-friendly and visually appealing designs.

I enjoy coding, reading sci-fi novels, and playing video games in my free time. Welcome to my personal website!

Articles

Guides, references, and tutorials.

  • Creating a Keyboard Shortcut Hook in React October 2024
  • Tables with Fixed Headers and Horizontal Scroll October 2024
  • How to Use WebSockets in a Redux Application February 2023
  • Understanding the GraphQL Type System January 2023
  • Testing API Calls With React Testing Library December 2022
); }; export default AboutMe;
